Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of variants that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation is immediately followed by Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that occur after SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in comparison to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation appears more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of variants in which First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation occurs after a revision cycle (e.g., following RW-EIC Accept or RW-EIC Minor Revision)
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that are preceded by First Look-Your updates are overdue
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'First Look-Your updates are overdue'

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation relative to Manuscript Export Succeeded in post-acceptance phases
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation that eventually reach Awaiting Assignment to Batch
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'

Name: Number of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation events that occur within 7 days of First Look-Please submit updates
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'First Look-Please submit updates' occurs

Name: Percentage of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation activities that appear in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation compared to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants ending with Manuscript Export Succeeded that include First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Percentage of 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
